aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: With more than {{ experience }} years of experience in web application development, I have had the opportunity to participate in various projects across different sectors, such as banking and the publishing industry.
aboutMe.moreInfo: Throughout each process, I have always been actively involved in decision-making at all levels, including analysis, design, and programming, with the firm belief that teamwork is essential for achieving objectives and for mutually expanding both personal and colleagues' knowledge.
aboutMe.extraInfo: Additionally, I have taken on technical leadership roles (Technical Lead), managing teams and providing the most suitable technical solutions for each case.

experience.title: Experience
experience.ic: Development of interactive materials for training courses.
experience.softek: Development of various projects for Isban (Banco Santander), the DGT (General Directorate of Traffic), and the tour operator TUI.
experience.eptisa: Development of hybrid mobile applications for Canal de Isabel II and ACOEMAN.
experience.goldenRace: Technical leadership in the development of virtual gambling games for various clients worldwide.
experience.foreworth: Development of a web application designed to assess/quantify the performance of company programmers based on different metrics derived from commits.
experience.vintegris: Development of applications for managing digital certificates and signatures.

multigames.title: Multigames
multigames.description: A collection of games for children, fully developed with Angular.

book.title: Testing Functionality and Optimizing Web Pages
book.description: Co-authorship of this manual primarily aimed at front-end developers.
